featured.text: Our personal celebrations, 22 weddings, promotions, graduations, and anniversaries, are 23 linked with drinking.
This often 31 their anniversary celebration, for his rose bouquet always came one month late.

definition.zh_def: 周年紀念，特定事件或日期的每年慶祝。
definition.en_def: A date that is remembered or celebrated because a special event occurred on that date in a previous year.
definition.example: They celebrated their wedding anniversary with a romantic dinner.
